review_title: fits fine but pocket is not centre
reviews: the product is decent enough. soft, fits well. I bought it to have my cousin screen print on it and we noticed that the pocket is about and inch and a bit off centre and kinda slanted. probably not noticable when on and moving. Im probably going to just stick to buying Haynes though from now on. Quality is "meh"
